post.body: nu-uh! We're coming to ur house!

Oh man :*( -- hey, in '03 we had 7ft in 12 hours and NUMEROUS avalanches closed I-70. Only Leadville-ites could get to Copper..

think u mean "joost"
i tried it - didn't find it worth my time. chk out the reviews
although I am still technically a 20's :)
is that a reflection of your circle of influence or the general tech population? i dn't think 20's are interested in this discussion
i dn't disagre w/ ur orignl pst. "b/c theyr used to thm" isn't a good reason. the usefulnes is. useful is defined by actual use tho
jst like my daughtr inherntly undrstnds a digital camra WAY faster thn someone older - b/c she grew up with it.
i thnk youngr gen undrstnds the "socialness" of a tool better than older gen...
they both need coaching. one gen grasps the tool faster. my experience is not based on assumptions or stereotypes. it actually hppens
didnt say thy need 20s mntorshp. my exprience is evidnce too, hwevr. i hve to help oldr gen more thn youngr gen. simple.
so othrs need to lern to use good tools too. so they can wrk w/ the grwing poplation of 20's more efficntly - whch goes bck to ur pst
how bout just anthr day - any day. "Normal"may never come
I like the sound of your PRican partay! :)
horrible horrible movie. Left a bad mark on th Cohen bros I thnk. Why gr8 reviews tho?!
thnx. Our Doc can call in frm MD if need b. Just need to avoid the ER being out of town and all. Thy wont knw wht to do w us here

was Intelink setup by Google??! That's what a new intel officer friend of mine was told.
Outprocessing SAIC.
What I would give for all this rain to be snow!! :/
Bout to go to party with new Company. Yay for first impressions!
last week with current employer - way more stressful than I had anticipated. :/
Good news! Care First approved nursing coverage for Emily :)
need to find a PEDS home care agency quick - MAXIM excluded!
woke up in a daze. too much stress
Independence Day. Oh goodness when did we think this was a good movie. Horrible horrible special effects. Stupid story. Bad acting. Yikes!
<shakingfist> i cant stand health insurnce companies - always looking for a way out >:( screw with my family will ya?! </shakingfist>
Apple Care was quite helpful. Apple = WIN!

I hate RSV (via Gmail/Google Talk):
Nate Lee updated their status message on Gmail/Google Talk “I hate RSV” 1 minute ag..
Oh. This is really not good. Emily has RSV again. Almost lost her to it last year. This is no overnight sickness and we're not even home :/
Settled in for night at Johnson City PICU. Hopefully good treatments, rest, n meds will get us home soon.
http://twitpic.com/xiua - En route to Johnson City Children's
Advanced Life Support amblnce frm Bristol dsn't hv pure sign wave power. can't run cough assist. Good thng we have own battery n inverter!!
At ER in Bristol, VA. Not holding sats - needing O2. Xray is ok, but need to transfer to Childrens in Johnson City, TN.

11 hrs to home...
Thanks for the bday shouts. Big 3 0 tday. Greying fast and takin names. It's been a busy 30 yrs.
Crud. Youngest spikes fever and we're out of town. Need meds.
